Title: Establishes minimum protocol requirements for gene synthesis providers and manufacturers of gene synthesis equipment
Summary: Establishes minimum protocol requirements for gene synthesis providers and manufacturers of gene synthesis equipment; requires such providers and manufacturers to operate in accordance with international gene synthesis consortium protocols.
LawCode: Add Art 32-B ยง3230, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing minimum protocol requirements for gene synthesis providers and manufacturers of gene synthesis equipment
